description:
When Conner first came out and did his solo with us, he told me that he liked both guys and girls. A few weeks later, he contacted me wanting to be with a guy.

Since he lives in a small town, he’s inexperienced and hasn’t had many opportunities to be with guys. Coming from a small town myself, I was happy to fulfill his wish and paired him with Bradley.

Bradley has never been with a guy, but after some negotiating, he agreed to come back and get serviced by Conner.

This was a definitely a new experience for both of them. However, they seemed to really enjoy each other and worked up to a nice hot, sweaty ending with cum all over Conner's face (and some in his mouth)!
title: Bradley & Conner
